extends Container

      • canHaveAsValue

        @Raw
public boolean canHaveAsValue(int value)
        Checks whether this backpack can have the given value as its value.
        Specified by:
        canHaveAsValue in interface Item
        Overrides:
        canHaveAsValue in class ItemImplementation
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given value is less than or equal to 500 and greater than or equal to 0. | result == ( (value <= 500) && (value >= 0) )
        See Also:
        Item
